page.title: 17Local Controversy
page.content: Certainly the subject that arouses the strongest feeling is Hunting. The presence of the League Against Cruel Sports as quite a large landowner makes the situation more critical and is an aggravation to the many local people who are very strongly pro- hunting. Staghunting provokes the keenest controversy. Many dislike the princ- iple and the apparent arrogance of some hunt followers, but fear that the deer may not survive the abolition of hunting, after which farmers might not tolerate the damage deer do to crops and banks. Others who did not feel very strongly said they kept quiet as they had neighbours who supported both factions. Several people whi live near the over head power line found the interference almost intolerabe and unsightly.
